definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to seem to grow younger/to regain one's youthful looks

sentences.english: Ginger has powerful anti-inflammatory properties and can slow cancer growth. Turmeric, the spice that forms the base of most curries, is from a root in the ginger family.
sentences.chinese: 姜具有強大的抗炎功能，能減緩腫瘤的生長。

sentences.english: Play checkers while the plants grow.
sentences.chinese: 當等待植物生長時，可以下下棋。

sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 這些拮抗菌的培養濾液也能抑制棉花黃萎菌的生長。

sentences.english: Thalli concentration is a key quality index in microbial growth process.
sentences.chinese: 菌體濃度是微生物生長過程中關鍵的質量指標。

sentences.english: Stratification was good for radicle growth.
sentences.chinese: 層積處理對胚根的生長有利。

sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨呈現典型的葉色褪綠及營養生長減弱。

sentences.english: During the growing season there is no time for socializing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 在作物生長季節，根本就沒工夫參加社交活動。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of somatostatin in uterus and blood of mouse during genesis cycle.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小鼠生殖週期子宮和血生長抑素的變化。

sentences.english: Inspiration-here they naturally grow up and we limitlessly imagine. …
sentences.chinese: 它們在這裏自然生長，我們在這裏任意幻想。

sentences.english: The growth of nestlings of in little egret and pond heron appeared in S curve.
sentences.chinese: 白鷺和池鷺雛鳥的生長表現爲S型生長曲線。

sentences.english: The growth of nestlings of in little egret and pond heron appeared in S curve.
sentences.chinese: 白鷺和池鷺雛鳥的生長表現爲S型生長曲線。

sentences.english: Totally, 33 growing stage-specific proteins were identified.
sentences.chinese: 共計鑑定到33個不同生長時期特異性蛋白質。

sentences.english: But the cutting has only rooted sucessfully if you can notice new growth.
sentences.chinese: 只有插枝被固定的非常好纔會開始生長。

sentences.english: Skin fibroblasts were succeeded to culture in the model and stretch based on the elastic membrane.
sentences.chinese: 人皮膚成纖維細胞在模型中生長狀態良第。

sentences.english: In contrast, growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 生長板軟骨爲原發性軟骨，由透明軟骨構成。

sentences.english: The growth performance of red tilapia cultured in freshwater was superior to other tilapia species.
sentences.chinese: 星洲紅魚在淡水中養殖生長表現優於其他羅非魚品種。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to sprout (leaves, buds, a beard etc)
to be classified as/to belong to/to be part of
